title: Snoop Dogg Interview and More
itunes:title: Snoop Dogg Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had the one and only Snoop Dogg stop by where he spoke about death row stories, Jay-Z and the NFL and Nipsey Hussle. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day"  to a 2 people from the crazy state Florida because of a botched castration and Angela helped some listeners during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
